name: (Yogscast2020) Shuuta
description:
A Yogscast Jam 2020 entry by Eero Höök (Roikku / LakeDead)

Gamepad use only. Multiplayer only.

Controls:

Left stick - Move

Right stick - Aim

Right trigger - Fire

(in main menu, ESC - quit to desktop)

dpad left/right - Change Win Limit count

A or Start  - Start match

Credits:

One "Test Metal" music track is by my friend Shelvid (shelvid - Twitch)

All other assets are mine. All art is mine and drawn during jam.

All sound FX are by me and made during jam (fun fact, I just recorded a 10-minute audioclip with several SFX noises with my voice + my BlueYeti microphone, and then cut that into separate files to be used)

Created with Game Maker 2, using tools such as paintNET and Audacity on the side.

Designed as couch multiplayer, and also global online multiplayer using the awesome Parsec -service.

Game, Work, and Play Together From Anywhere | Parsec (parsecgaming.com)

 

Theme: SURPRISE
The surprise is what's in the level, 
behind the fog of war.

Bonus themes: 
Caveblazers - Live. Die. Repeat.
Drink More Glurp - Put some aliens in it!

PS: There are some emergency keyboard controls for player 4 for testing or if one ore more controllers are missing, like is in my case.

 (WASD - move, 

Arrowkeys - aim, 

Space/Ctrl/Shift - Fire)
